mapper.select: select * from photo order by p_idx desc
select pp.* from ( select rank() over(order by p_idx desc) as no, p.* from (select * from photo) p )pp where no between #{ start } and #{ end }
select * from photo where p_idx=#{ p_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into photo values(null,#{ p_title },#{ p_content }, #{ p_filename },#{ p_ip }, now(),#{ mem_idx },#{ mem_name })
mapper.delete: delete from photo where p_idx=#{ p_idx }
mapper.update: update photo set p_filename=#{ p_filename } where p_idx=#{ p_idx }
update photo set p_title= #{ p_title }, p_content=#{ p_content } where p_idx=#{ p_idx }
